name: Monochrome Kingdom DEMO
description:
The Monochrome Kingdom Demo is here!
A semi-sequel to Pandemony!,  Monochrome Kingdom is a retro style JRPG with powerful equipment, dungeon crawls, tons of quests and total freedom.

With six playable classes, you can create a party of four and search the Kingdom for adventure. The story concerns a powerful artifact, and your journey to stop it from getting into the wrong hands. But who's to say whose hands they are?

This Demo offers four of the main story Temples, four Cities, two Villages, sneak peaks at four Factions and a collection of sidequests. The full game is still in development, so this demo doesn't necessarily represent the final product.

Classes at your disposal include:

  • Fighter
  • Cleric
  • Rogue
  • Wizard
  • Monk
  • Paladin

Controls are:

WASD or Arrow Keys - MoveZ, Enter or Space - Interract  ESC or X - Menu/Cancel Shift - Run F5 - Fullscreen  F6 - Toggle Resolution
